content: **update by request i have added an additional chart 9 in total do something** update 3 more new charts are added 8 in total kamala 2024 harris walz kamala & tim update a 5th chart has been added kamala is brat i m not sure if that one is going to catch on or not but i wanted to make it available * the 2024 us presidential election is the most consequential we have ever faced i felt it was important as an ordinary citizen to do what i could to encourage voter participation knowing what a powerful cohort the knitting community can be i wanted to create a hat to get the message out this pattern is free and i hope you will consider not only making a hat for all of your friends but also to use it for fundraising to donate to candidates school board candidates especially need funds there are four options for the stranded section see the chart options this hat uses bulky yarn for a fast knit and features colorwork in two colors for bold graphics it s a simple pattern and i hope that the stranded knitting is easy enough to encourage people who have never tried it to give it a go size one size for adults gauge 15 sts and 20 row = 4 inches 10 cm with larger needles needles us 9 and us 10 us 10 double pointed needed for crown shaping yarn bulky less than one skein each of the following yarns color a cascade yarns ® 128 superwash® in aporto color b cascade yarns ® 128 superwash® in feather grey color c cascade yarns ® 128 superwash® in ruby good luck and don t forget to vote
